original_title: My Little Pony Friendship is Magic: The Mane Attraction
overview: Applejack is concerned that her old friends manager might not have her best interests at heart. Starlight Glimmer returns with a spell that could change the past, present, and future of Equestria forever, its up to Princess Twilight and the Ponies to ensure this doesn't happen!
title: My Little Pony Friendship is Magic: The Mane Attraction
